name: Indiana Frog
description:
Indiana Frog is a platformer currently in  early development. The three demo  levels show the core mechanics and the main character movement.

Controls:

  • Jump around pressing the left or the right arrow keys, the more you press it the higher the jump will be, if you are playing on Android press the screen on the left or on the right.
  • You can exit the game pressing ESC  or pressing "back" on Android.

Hope you enjoy it!

Any comments or suggestions are welcome!
